overview: A documentary film about the life of Zvonko and Julienne Bušić, who in 1976, along with three other Croatians, hijacked a TWA airliner with the sole goal of forcing major world media to publish a leaflet on the human rights abuses against Croatians and others in the former Yugoslav dictatorship: murders, assassinations, imprisonment of students and intellectuals...
title: Lovers and Madmen
